card.name: Abyssal Nightstalker
card.text: Whenever Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, defending player discards a card.

card.name: Alaborn Cavalier
card.text: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Alaborn Veteran
card.text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Alaborn Zealot
card.text: When Alaborn Zealot blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Alaborn Zealot.

card.name: Alluring Scent
card.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

card.name: Ancient Craving
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Angel of Fury
card.text: Flying When Angel of Fury is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may shuffle it into your library.

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.text: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Apprentice Sorcerer
card.text: {T}: Apprentice Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Archangel
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Armored Galleon
card.text: Armored Galleon can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.name: Armored Griffin
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Bargain
card.text: Target opponent draws a card. You gain 7 life.

card.name: Bee Sting
card.text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blaze
card.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Bloodcurdling Scream
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Breath of Life
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Brimstone Dragon
card.text: Flying, haste

card.name: Brutal Nightstalker
card.text: When Brutal Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

card.name: Chorus of Woe
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Coastal Wizard
card.text: {T}: Return Coastal Wizard and another target creature to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Coercion
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Cruel Edict
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Cunning Giant
card.text: If Cunning Giant is unblocked, you may have it assign its combat damage to a creature defending player controls.

card.name: Dakmor Plague
card.text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Dakmor Sorceress
card.text: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

card.name: Dark Offering
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Deathcoil Wurm
card.text: You may have Deathcoil Wurm assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Deep Wood
card.text: Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

card.name: Deja Vu
card.text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Denizen of the Deep
card.text: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Earthquake
card.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

card.name: Extinguish
card.text: Counter target sorcery spell.

card.name: Eye Spy
card.text: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into his or her graveyard.

card.name: False Summoning
card.text: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Festival of Trokin
card.text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Foul Spirit
card.text: Flying When Foul Spirit enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

card.name: Goblin Firestarter
card.text: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: Goblin Firestarter deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Goblin General
card.text: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Glider
card.text: Flying Goblin Glider can't block.

card.name: Goblin Lore
card.text: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.

card.name: Goblin Matron
card.text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Goblin Raider
card.text: Goblin Raider can't block.

card.name: Goblin War Cry
card.text: Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Other creatures he or she controls can't block this turn.

card.name: Goblin War Strike
card.text: Goblin War Strike deals damage equal to the number of Goblins you control to target player.

card.name: Hand of Death
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Harmony of Nature
card.text: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Hidden Horror
card.text: When Hidden Horror enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

card.name: Hurricane
card.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

card.name: Ironhoof Ox
card.text: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Jagged Lightning
card.text: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures.

card.name: Just Fate
card.text: Cast Just Fate only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Kiss of Death
card.text: Kiss of Death deals 4 damage to target opponent. You gain 4 life.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.

card.name: Lone Wolf
card.text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Lurking Nightstalker
card.text: Whenever Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Magma Giant
card.text: When Magma Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.text: Target player discards two cards.

card.name: Monstrous Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Mystic Denial
card.text: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

card.name: Natural Spring
card.text: Target player gains 8 life.

card.name: Nature's Lore
card.text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Nightstalker Engine
card.text: Nightstalker Engine's power is equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Norwood Priestess
card.text: {T}: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Norwood Riders
card.text: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Norwood Warrior
card.text: Whenever Norwood Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ogre Arsonist
card.text: When Ogre Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

card.name: Ogre Taskmaster
card.text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.

card.name: Path of Peace
card.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

card.name: Piracy
card.text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.

card.name: Predatory Nightstalker
card.text: When Predatory Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Prowling Nightstalker
card.text: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by black creatures.

card.name: Rain of Daggers
card.text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rally the Troops
card.text: Cast Rally the Troops only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Razorclaw Bear
card.text: Whenever Razorclaw Bear becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Remove
card.text: Cast Remove only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Return target attacking creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Renewing Touch
card.text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Return of the Nightstalkers
card.text: Return all Nightstalker permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then destroy all Swamps you control.

card.name: Righteous Charge
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Righteous Fury
card.text: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Salvage
card.text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Screeching Drake
card.text: Flying When Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Sea Drake
card.text: Flying When Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Spitting Earth
card.text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Steam Catapult
card.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Steam Frigate
card.text: Steam Frigate can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Swarm of Rats
card.text: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.

card.name: Sylvan Basilisk
card.text: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.

card.name: Sylvan Yeti
card.text: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Talas Explorer
card.text: Flying When Talas Explorer enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: Talas Researcher
card.text: {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Talas Warrior
card.text: Talas Warrior can't be blocked.

card.name: Temple Acolyte
card.text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Temple Elder
card.text: {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Temporal Manipulation
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Theft of Dreams
card.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Tidal Surge
card.text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

card.name: Time Ebb
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Touch of Brilliance
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Town Sentry
card.text: Whenever Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Tremor
card.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Undo
card.text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Untamed Wilds
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Vampiric Spirit
card.text: Flying When Vampiric Spirit enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life.

card.name: Vengeance
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Warrior's Stand
card.text: Cast Warrior's Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Wildfire
card.text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

card.name: Wind Sail
card.text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
